title: Law repealing all Legal Instruments brought into force before the date of Independence
title_en: Law repealing all Legal Instruments brought into force before the date of Independence

provisions.title: Article One – Purpose of this law
provisions.content: This Law repeals all legal instruments brought into force before the date of independence of Rwanda.

provisions.title: Article 2 – Definitions
provisions.content: In this Law, the following terms mean: 1. “ legal instruments ”: laws, decreelaws, decrees, legislative ordinances, law-ordinances, ordinances, ordinances of Ruanda-Urundi, royal orders, decrees of the Governor General, orders of the Resident and Special Resident, regulations, presidential orders, ministerial orders, edicts and declarations; 2. “ before the date of independence ”: period of time running from the year 1885 to 1st July 1962.

provisions.title: Article 3 – Repealing provision
provisions.content: All legal instruments, brought into force before the date of independence of Rwanda, are repealed.

provisions.title: Article 4 – Drafting, consideration and adoption of this Law
provisions.content: This Law was drafted, considered and adopted in Ikinyarwanda.

provisions.title: Article 5 – Commencement
provisions.content: This Law comes into force on the date of its publication in the Official Gazette of the Republic of Rwanda.
